@Sir Dragon No you retard the  husband is  not  shown in way to be disliked.  Netori doesnt necessarily mean the person who gets cucked is the one who deserves it Get ur shitty fact straight before you talk bs.

The reason this Doujin has good "NTR" is because it's netori bot regular netorare , meaning that the Main character is the "Bad guy" while the "good guy" is Shown in a way so you dislike him 
It's basically a change of perspective

Sooo, basically, this all happened because the old guy was salt for being a useless prick who couldn't get the girl in his time, and then decided to ruin the lives of unrelated people to get "revenge" for nothing. Well, decent fap anyway, only thought that the sex scenes were kind of short.

@佐倉ほむら  : or 4., complain about the said ppl who did 3 and wishes everyone that's against positive response to just shut up instead of doing 2. It's the internet, deal with it. Who's the cuck btw?
Good read This is one of the few ntrs that I can actually read. But I actually wasn't all that into it once they turned into total meat slaves.

@metroid Always taking the words out of my mouth. It's like these "cuck" readers just can't seem to stay from making a comment about this stuff. When the best choice of action should be either 1. Immediately drop it and avoid it like the plague. 2. Read it, move on, and never speak of it again. 

Instead they predictably take the third option. 3. Read it, get angry/upset with it, and then stew up a storm in the comments. It's almost laughable, their antics. They should just blacklist NTR tags and avoid reading doujins that has the tag. But of course... That would just make too much sense.

@bulldogblitz267  Because the structure of ntr here is weak we only see husband for a short while his presence is mostly non existent throughout the story so you dont get to empathize with him much and there fore dont care what happens to him
This is the first NTR that even though I should feel bad for the husband and hate the wife, I feel nothing like that at all. Rather I feel the same way as if I read a vanilla hentai. Really weird.

Ntr makes cuck readers talkative...
The previous owners died from an illness..... suspicious

Moral of the story is don't hire male part timers if you run a cafe with a beautiful wife. If you plan on being hospitalized immediately fire the male staff before it becomes a netorare cafe. Mmm other than that I guess train your penis to become as large and thick as your leg so the women around you won't succumb to the netorare disease. 

Completely unrelated but I just had a weird thought about what this cafe would look like if the women were replaced with men, shooting netorare milk from their pee pee. Horrifying thought... 

Last but least holy shit that old retired guy knows how to keep a grudge lol. What I don't understand though is why he didn't become the NTR man instead. In most scenarios old people with 30 years worth of grudge ends up becoming the walking embodiment of NTR and rape the mother and the daughter who grows up to be a spitting image of her mother. 

Overall this was a great read. I hope to see more netorare cafes.
